items.content_html: This application streamlines the management of exhibits in a science museum. The frontend is built using React and Tauri, providing a responsive and lightweight user interface. The backend server and database are developed with Warp and Rustqlite in Rust, ensuring robust performance and reliability.
items.title: ljt019/exhibit_manager: This application streamlines the management of exhibits in a science museum. The frontend is built using React and Tauri, providing a responsive and lightweight user interface. The backend server and database are developed with Warp and Rustqlite in Rust, ensuring robust performance and reliability.

items.content_html: Ta5beesScript is an open-source, lightweight scripting language designed for clarity, expressiveness, and developer happiness. Built with Arabeezi syntax in mind, it blends humor, cultural relevance, and technical robustness to create a language that's not just fun but also functional and usable by Arabic-speaking programmers worldwide.
